SELECT BAAPPBASEID, BAAPPEXPANDID, APNO, SEQNO, MONINCOMEMK, MONINCOME, MARRYDATE, DIGAMYDATE, HANDICAPMK, STUDMK, ABANAPPLYMK, ABANAPSYM, ABLEAPSYM, RAISECHILDMK, INTERDICTMK, INTERDICTDATE, REPEALINTERDICTDATE, BENMISSINGSDATE, BENMISSINGEDATE, PRISONSDATE, PRISONEDATE, RELATCHGDATE, ADOPTDATE, ASSIGNIDNNO, ASSIGNNAME, ASSIGNBRDATE, RAISEEVTMK, SAVINGMK, COMPELMK, SCHOOLCODE, HANDICAPMK From BAAPPEXPAND A WHERE A.BAAPPBASEID = #baappbaseId:NUMERIC#

sqlMap.update: UPDATE BAAPPEXPAND SET EVAPPTYP = #evAppTyp:VARCHAR#, EVTYP = #evTyp:VARCHAR#, EVCODE = #evCode:VARCHAR#, CRIINPART1 = #criInPart1:VARCHAR#, CRIINPART2 = #criInPart2:VARCHAR#, CRIINPART3 = #criInPart3:VARCHAR#, CRIMEDIUM = #criMedium:VARCHAR#, CRIINJNME1 = #criInJnme1:VARCHAR#, CRIINJNME2 = #criInJnme2:VARCHAR#, CRIINJNME3 = #criInJnme3:VARCHAR#, CRIINJNME4 = #criInJnme4:VARCHAR#, JUDGEDATE = #judgeDate:VARCHAR#, FAMAPPMK = #famAppMk:VARCHAR#, MONNOTIFYINGMK = #monNotifyingMk:VARCHAR#, PRTYPE = #prType:VARCHAR#, UPDUSER = #updUser:VARCHAR#, UPDTIME = #updTime:VARCHAR# WHERE BAAPPEXPANDID = #baappexpandId:NUMERIC#
Update BAAPPEXPAND set ABLEAPSYM = #ableApsYm:VARCHAR# Where APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# and SEQNO = '0000' and BAAPPBASEID = #baappbaseId:NUMERIC#
sqlMap.select: SELECT A.BAAPPEXPANDID, A.BAAPPBASEID, A.APNO, A.SEQNO, A.CANCELMK, A.CANCELYM, A.OCACCIDENTMK, A.PRTYPE, A.CRIMEDIUM, A.EVTYP, A.EVCODE, A.CRIINPART1, A.CRIINPART2, A.CRIINPART3, A.CRIINJNME1, A.CRIINJNME2, A.CRIINJNME3, A.CRIINJNME4, A.CRIINJCL1, A.CRIINJCL2, A.CRIINJCL3, A.CRIINJDP1, A.CRIINJDP2, A.CRIINJDP3, A.CRIINJDP4, A.CRIINJDP5, A.CRIINJDP6, A.CRIINJDP7, A.CRIINJDP8, A.CRIINJDP9, A.CRIINJDP10, A.CRIINISSUL, A.REHCMK, A.REHCYM, A.HOSID, A.DOCTORNAME1, A.DOCTORNAME2, A.OCACCADDAMT, A.FAMAPPMK, A.PRFMLYMK, A.MONINCOMEMK, A.MONINCOME, A.STUDMK, A.MARRYDATE, A.DIGAMYDATE, A.ABANAPPLYMK, A.ABANAPSYM, A.ABLEAPSYM, A.RAISECHILDMK, A.HANDICAPMK, A.INTERDICTMK, A.INTERDICTDATE, A.BENMISSINGSDATE, A.BENMISSINGEDATE, A.PRISONSDATE, A.PRISONEDATE, A.RELATCHGDATE, A.ADOPTDATE, A.JUDGEDATE, A.ASSIGNIDNNO, A.ASSIGNNAME, A.ASSIGNBRDATE, A.CRTUSER, A.CRTTIME, A.UPDUSER, A.UPDTIME, A.RAISEEVTMK, A.DEDUCTDAY, A.ADWKMK, A.MONNOTIFYINGMK, B.PARAMNAME AS EVTYPNAME FROM BAAPPEXPAND A, BAPARAM B WHERE A.BAAPPBASEID = #baappbaseId:NUMERIC# AND A.EVTYP = B.PARAMCODE (+) AND B.PARAMGROUP (+) = 'EVTYP' AND B.PARAMUSEMK (+) = 'Y'

SELECT A.BAAPPEXPANDID, A.BAAPPBASEID, A.APNO, A.SEQNO, A.CANCELMK, A.CANCELYM, A.OCACCIDENTMK, A.PRTYPE, A.CRIMEDIUM, A.EVTYP, A.EVCODE, A.CRIINPART1, A.CRIINPART2, A.CRIINPART3, A.CRIINJNME1, A.CRIINJNME2, A.CRIINJNME3, A.CRIINJNME4, A.CRIINJCL1, A.CRIINJCL2, A.CRIINJCL3, A.CRIINJDP1, A.CRIINJDP2, A.CRIINJDP3, A.CRIINJDP4, A.CRIINJDP5, A.CRIINJDP6, A.CRIINJDP7, A.CRIINJDP8, A.CRIINJDP9, A.CRIINJDP10, A.CRIINISSUL, A.REHCMK, A.REHCYM, A.HOSID, A.DOCTORNAME1, A.DOCTORNAME2, A.OCACCADDAMT, A.FAMAPPMK, A.PRFMLYMK, A.MONINCOMEMK, A.MONINCOME, A.STUDMK, A.MARRYDATE, A.DIGAMYDATE, A.ABANAPPLYMK, A.ABANAPSYM, A.ABLEAPSYM, A.RAISECHILDMK, A.HANDICAPMK, A.INTERDICTMK, A.INTERDICTDATE, A.BENMISSINGSDATE, A.BENMISSINGEDATE, A.PRISONSDATE, A.PRISONEDATE, A.RELATCHGDATE, A.ADOPTDATE, A.JUDGEDATE, A.ASSIGNIDNNO, A.ASSIGNNAME, A.ASSIGNBRDATE, A.CRTUSER, A.CRTTIME, A.UPDUSER, A.UPDTIME, A.RAISEEVTMK, A.DEDUCTDAY, A.ADWKMK, A.MONNOTIFYINGMK, B.PARAMNAME AS EVTYPNAME FROM BAAPPEXPAND A, BAPARAM B WHERE A.BAAPPBASEID = #baappbaseId:NUMERIC# AND A.EVTYP = B.PARAMCODE (+) AND B.PARAMGROUP (+) = 'EVTYP' AND B.PARAMUSEMK (+) = 'Y'

SELECT A.BAAPPEXPANDID, A.BAAPPBASEID, A.APNO, A.SEQNO, A.CANCELMK, A.CANCELYM, A.OCACCIDENTMK, A.PRTYPE, A.CRIMEDIUM, A.EVTYP, A.EVCODE, A.CRIINPART1, A.CRIINPART2, A.CRIINPART3, A.CRIINJNME1, A.CRIINJNME2, A.CRIINJNME3, A.CRIINJNME4, A.CRIINJCL1, A.CRIINJCL2, A.CRIINJCL3, A.CRIINJDP1, A.CRIINJDP2, A.CRIINJDP3, A.CRIINJDP4, A.CRIINJDP5, A.CRIINJDP6, A.CRIINJDP7, A.CRIINJDP8, A.CRIINJDP9, A.CRIINJDP10, A.CRIINISSUL, A.REHCMK, A.REHCYM, A.HOSID, A.DOCTORNAME1, A.DOCTORNAME2, A.OCACCADDAMT, A.FAMAPPMK, A.PRFMLYMK, A.MONINCOMEMK, A.MONINCOME, A.STUDMK, A.MARRYDATE, A.DIGAMYDATE, A.ABANAPPLYMK, A.ABANAPSYM, A.ABLEAPSYM, A.RAISECHILDMK, A.HANDICAPMK, A.INTERDICTMK, A.INTERDICTDATE, A.BENMISSINGSDATE, A.BENMISSINGEDATE, A.PRISONSDATE, A.PRISONEDATE, A.RELATCHGDATE, A.ADOPTDATE, A.JUDGEDATE, A.ASSIGNIDNNO, A.ASSIGNNAME, A.ASSIGNBRDATE, A.CRTUSER, A.CRTTIME, A.UPDUSER, A.UPDTIME, A.RAISEEVTMK, A.DEDUCTDAY, A.ADWKMK, A.MONNOTIFYINGMK, B.PARAMNAME AS EVTYPNAME FROM BAAPPEXPAND A, BAPARAM B WHERE A.BAAPPBASEID = #baappbaseId:NUMERIC# AND A.EVTYP = B.PARAMCODE (+) AND B.PARAMGROUP (+) = 'EVTYP' AND B.PARAMUSEMK (+) = 'Y'

SELECT A.BAAPPEXPANDID, A.BAAPPBASEID, A.APNO, A.SEQNO, A.CANCELMK, A.CANCELYM, A.OCACCIDENTMK, A.PRTYPE, A.CRIMEDIUM, A.EVTYP, A.EVCODE, A.CRIINPART1, A.CRIINPART2, A.CRIINPART3, A.CRIINJNME1, A.CRIINJNME2, A.CRIINJNME3, A.CRIINJNME4, A.CRIINJCL1, A.CRIINJCL2, A.CRIINJCL3, A.CRIINJDP1, A.CRIINJDP2, A.CRIINJDP3, A.CRIINJDP4, A.CRIINJDP5, A.CRIINJDP6, A.CRIINJDP7, A.CRIINJDP8, A.CRIINJDP9, A.CRIINJDP10, A.CRIINISSUL, A.REHCMK, A.REHCYM, A.HOSID, A.DOCTORNAME1, A.DOCTORNAME2, A.OCACCADDAMT, A.FAMAPPMK, A.PRFMLYMK, A.MONINCOMEMK, A.MONINCOME, A.STUDMK, A.MARRYDATE, A.DIGAMYDATE, A.ABANAPPLYMK, A.ABANAPSYM, A.ABLEAPSYM, A.RAISECHILDMK, A.HANDICAPMK, A.INTERDICTMK, A.INTERDICTDATE, A.BENMISSINGSDATE, A.BENMISSINGEDATE, A.PRISONSDATE, A.PRISONEDATE, A.RELATCHGDATE, A.ADOPTDATE, A.JUDGEDATE, A.ASSIGNIDNNO, A.ASSIGNNAME, A.ASSIGNBRDATE, A.CRTUSER, A.CRTTIME, A.UPDUSER, A.UPDTIME, A.RAISEEVTMK, A.DEDUCTDAY, A.ADWKMK, A.MONNOTIFYINGMK, B.PARAMNAME AS EVTYPNAME FROM BAAPPEXPAND A, BAPARAM B WHERE A.BAAPPBASEID = #baappbaseId:NUMERIC# AND A.EVTYP = B.PARAMCODE (+) AND B.PARAMGROUP (+) = 'EVTYP' AND B.PARAMUSEMK (+) = 'Y'

SELECT PRTYPE, CRIMEDIUM, EVTYP, REHCYM, OCACCIDENTMK, EVCODE, CRIINISSUL, CRIINJCL1, CRIINJCL2, CRIINJCL3, CRIINPART1, CRIINPART2, CRIINPART3, CRIINJNME1, CRIINJNME2, CRIINJNME3, CRIINJNME4, CRIINJDP1, CRIINJDP2, CRIINJDP3, CRIINJDP4, CRIINJDP5, CRIINJDP6, CRIINJDP7, CRIINJDP8, CRIINJDP9, CRIINJDP10, HOSID, DOCTORNAME1, DOCTORNAME2, DEDUCTDAY, JUDGEDATE, FAMAPPMK, DISQUALMK, OCACCHOSID, OCACCDOCTORNAME1, OCACCDOCTORNAME2, EVAPPTYP FROM BAAPPEXPAND WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND SEQNO = '0000'

SELECT PRTYPE, CRIMEDIUM, EVTYP, REHCYM, OCACCIDENTMK, EVCODE, CRIINISSUL, CRIINJCL1, CRIINJCL2, CRIINJCL3, CRIINPART1, CRIINPART2, CRIINPART3, CRIINJNME1, CRIINJNME2, CRIINJNME3, CRIINJNME4, CRIINJDP1, CRIINJDP2, CRIINJDP3, CRIINJDP4, CRIINJDP5, CRIINJDP6, CRIINJDP7, CRIINJDP8, CRIINJDP9, CRIINJDP10, HOSID, DOCTORNAME1, DOCTORNAME2, JUDGEDATE, FAMAPPMK, DEDUCTDAY, DISQUALMK, OCACCHOSID, OCACCDOCTORNAME1, OCACCDOCTORNAME2, EVAPPTYP FROM BAAPPEXPAND WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND SEQNO = '0000' AND SUBSTR(APNO,1,1) = 'K'

SELECT PRTYPE, CRIMEDIUM, EVTYP, REHCYM, OCACCIDENTMK, EVCODE, CRIINISSUL, CRIINJCL1, CRIINJCL2, CRIINJCL3, CRIINPART1, CRIINPART2, CRIINPART3, CRIINJNME1, CRIINJNME2, CRIINJNME3, CRIINJNME4, CRIINJDP1, CRIINJDP2, CRIINJDP3, CRIINJDP4, CRIINJDP5, CRIINJDP6, CRIINJDP7, CRIINJDP8, CRIINJDP9, CRIINJDP10, HOSID, DOCTORNAME1, DOCTORNAME2, JUDGEDATE, FAMAPPMK, DEDUCTDAY, DISQUALMK, OCACCHOSID, OCACCDOCTORNAME1, OCACCDOCTORNAME2, EVAPPTYP FROM BAAPPEXPAND WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND SEQNO = '0000' AND SUBSTR(APNO,1,1) = 'S'

SELECT APNO ,SEQNO ,REHCMK ,REHCYM ,MONINCOMEMK ,MONINCOME ,STUDMK ,MARRYDATE ,DIGAMYDATE ,ABANAPSYM ,RAISECHILDMK ,HANDICAPMK ,INTERDICTMK ,INTERDICTDATE ,REPEALINTERDICTDATE ,BENMISSINGSDATE ,BENMISSINGEDATE ,PRISONSDATE ,PRISONEDATE ,RELATCHGDATE ,ADOPTDATE ,JUDGEDATE ,RAISEEVTMK ,ASSIGNIDNNO ,ASSIGNNAME ,ASSIGNBRDATE ,ABLEAPSYM ,SAVINGMK FROM BAAPPEXPAND WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND SEQNO = #seqNo:VARCHAR#

SELECT PRTYPE, CRIMEDIUM, EVTYP, REHCYM, OCACCIDENTMK, EVCODE, CRIINISSUL, CRIINJCL1, CRIINJCL2, CRIINJCL3, CRIINPART1, CRIINPART2, CRIINPART3, CRIINJNME1, CRIINJNME2, CRIINJNME3, CRIINJNME4, CRIINJDP1, CRIINJDP2, CRIINJDP3, CRIINJDP4, CRIINJDP5, CRIINJDP6, CRIINJDP7, CRIINJDP8, CRIINJDP9, CRIINJDP10, HOSID, DOCTORNAME1, DOCTORNAME2, JUDGEDATE, FAMAPPMK, DEDUCTDAY, DISQUALMK, OCACCHOSID, OCACCDOCTORNAME1, OCACCDOCTORNAME2, EVAPPTYP FROM BAAPPEXPAND WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND SEQNO = '0000' AND SUBSTR(APNO,1,1) = 'S'

SELECT PRTYPE, CRIMEDIUM, EVTYP, REHCYM, OCACCIDENTMK, EVCODE, CRIINISSUL, CRIINJCL1, CRIINJCL2, CRIINJCL3, CRIINPART1, CRIINPART2, CRIINPART3, CRIINJNME1, CRIINJNME2, CRIINJNME3, CRIINJNME4, CRIINJDP1, CRIINJDP2, CRIINJDP3, CRIINJDP4, CRIINJDP5, CRIINJDP6, CRIINJDP7, CRIINJDP8, CRIINJDP9, CRIINJDP10, HOSID, DOCTORNAME1, DOCTORNAME2, JUDGEDATE, FAMAPPMK, DEDUCTDAY, DISQUALMK, OCACCHOSID, OCACCDOCTORNAME1, OCACCDOCTORNAME2, EVAPPTYP FROM BAAPPEXPAND WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND SEQNO = '0000' AND SUBSTR(APNO,1,1) = 'K'
select ABLEAPSYM from BAAPPEXPAND where APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# and SEQNO = '0000' and BAAPPBASEID = #baappbaseId:NUMERIC#
SELECT COMNPMK FROM BAAPPEXPAND WHERE BAAPPBASEID = #baappbaseId:NUMERIC# AND APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND SEQNO = #seqNo:VARCHAR#
SELECT MONNOTIFYINGMK FROM BAAPPEXPAND WHERE BAAPPBASEID = #baappbaseId:NUMERIC# AND APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND SEQNO = #seqNo:VARCHAR#
SELECT NLWKMK, ADWKMK FROM BAAPPEXPAND WHERE BAAPPBASEID = #baappbaseId:NUMERIC# AND APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND SEQNO = '0000' AND (SUBSTR(APNO,1,1) = 'S' OR SUBSTR(APNO,1,1) = 'K')
sqlMap.update: UPDATE BAAPPEXPAND SET CPIBASEYM = '', UPDUSER = #updUser:VARCHAR#, UPDTIME = #updTime:VARCHAR# WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#
UPDATE BAAPPEXPAND SET INSAVGAMTAPPYEAR = '', UPDUSER = #updUser:VARCHAR#, UPDTIME = #updTime:VARCHAR# WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#
